articles.content:
Researchers say they may have found a reason for a rare blood clotting condition that has occurred in some people who received the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine.
Anatolii Stepanov/AFP via Getty Image… [+3974 chars]
articles.description: A rare blood clotting condition has occurred in some people after receiving the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine. If the new research is correct, it could mean that blood clots could be easily treated.
articles.title: European Scientists Zero In On AstraZeneca Blood Clot Link - NPR

articles.content: The European Unions (EU) executive arm is increasing its pressure on pharmaceutical companies to speed up their vaccine delivery to the continent as virus numbers are rising again in many member coun… [+1466 chars]
articles.description: The European Commission said Saturday that AstraZeneca in particular could face export bans to countries outside the EU if it didn’t quickly deliver the promised amount of vaccines to the 27-nation bloc.
articles.title: EU threatens AstraZeneca with export ban if it fails to deliver 'promised amount of vaccines' to the bloc - Hindustan Times
